borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 5040 - Horse Chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum) - Reduce by 2-3m. Final height 11-12m. Final spread 11-12m. Reduce top by 2-3m.5073 - Holm Oak - Evergreen Oak (Quercus ilex)	- Reduce end-weight on large limb/secondary stem (W) by reducing by 2-3m. Final height unchanged at 14m. Final spread 11-12m.5445 - Holm Oak - Evergreen Oak (Quercus ilex)	- Reduce loading on defect limb by length reduction of 2-3m; prune to viable growth points to maintain natural canopy outline with residual crown; Reduce adjacent weak limb by 2-3m. Final height 18m. Final spread 18m.5476 - Dead Horse Chestnut (Aesculus hippocastanum) - Reduce to a monolith @ 3m from ground level.5504 - Dawn Redwood (Metasequoia glyptostroboides) - Crown clean by removal of dead wood and weak branches; Crown lift over roof to give 2-3m clearance.
